metadata.title: CM Balochistan expresses grief over demise of Justice Jamal Khan Mandokhailâ€™s mother

content.article_body: QUETTA, Jun 21 (APP): Balochistan Chief Minister, Mir Sarfraz Bugti has expressed deep sorrow and grief over the passing of the mother of Supreme Court Judge Justice Jamal Khan Mandokhail and Senator Bilal Khan Mandokhail. In his condolence message on Saturday, the chief minister prayed for the eternal peace and elevation of ranks of the departed soul and granting of strength and patience for the bereaved family to bear the loss with patience. The chief minister extended his sympathies to the Mandokhail family.
